BPQ020.label: Ever told you had high blood pressure
BPQ020.text: {Have you/Has SP} ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that {you/s/he} had hypertension, also called high blood pressure?
BPQ020.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

BPQ030.label: Told had high blood pressure - 2+ times
BPQ030.text: {Were you/Was SP} told on 2 or more different visits that {you/s/he} had hypertension, also called high blood pressure?
BPQ030.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

BPQ040A.label: Taking prescription for hypertension
BPQ040A.text: Because of {your/SP's} (high blood pressure/hypertension), {have you/has s/he} ever been told to . . . take prescribed medicine?
BPQ040A.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

BPQ050A.label: Now taking prescribed medicine for HBP
BPQ050A.text: {Are you/Is SP} now taking prescribed medicine?
BPQ050A.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

BPQ080.label: Doctor told you - high cholesterol level
BPQ080.text: {Have you/Has SP} ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that {your/his/her} blood cholesterol level was high?
BPQ080.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

BPQ060.label: Ever had blood cholesterol checked
BPQ060.text: {Have you/Has SP} ever had {your/his/her} blood cholesterol checked?
BPQ060.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

BPQ070.label: When blood cholesterol last checked
BPQ070.text: About how long has it been since {you/SP} last had {your/his/her} blood cholesterol checked? Has it been...
BPQ070.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

2.description: 1 year but less than 2 years ago

3.description: 2 years but less than 5 years ago

BPQ090D.label: Told to take prescription for cholesterol
BPQ090D.text: [To lower (your/his/her) blood cholesterol, (have/has) (you/SP) ever been told by a doctor or other health professional]... to take prescribed medicine?
BPQ090D.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

BPQ100D.label: Now taking prescribed medicine
BPQ100D.text: (Are you/Is SP) now following this advice to take prescribed medicine?
BPQ100D.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

ALQ111.label: Ever had a drink of any kind of alcohol
ALQ111.text: The next questions are about drinking alcoholic beverages. Included are liquor (such as whiskey or gin), beer, wine, wine coolers, and any other type of alcoholic beverage. In {your/SP's} entire life, {have you/has he/has she} had at least 1 drink of any kind of alcohol, not counting small tastes or sips? By a drink, I mean a 12 oz. beer, a 5 oz. glass of wine, or one and a half ounces of liquor.
ALQ111.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

ALQ121.label: Past 12 mo how often drink alcoholic bev
ALQ121.text: During the past 12 months, about how often did {you/SP} drink any type of alcoholic beverage? PROBE: How many days per week, per month, or per year did {you/SP} drink?
ALQ121.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

8.description: 7 to 11 times in the last year

9.description: 3 to 6 times in the last year

10.description: 1 to 2 times in the last year

ALQ130.label: Avg # alcoholic drinks/day - past 12 mos
ALQ130.text: During the past 12 months, on those days that {you/SP} drank alcoholic beverages, on the average, how many drinks did {you/he/she} have? By a drink, I mean a 12 oz. beer, a 5 oz. glass of wine, or one and a half ounces of liquor.)
ALQ130.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

ALQ142.label: # days have 4 or 5 drinks/past 12 mos
ALQ142.text: During the past 12 months, about how often did {you/SP} have {DISPLAY NUMBER} or more drinks of any alcoholic beverage? PROBE: How many days per week, per month, or per year did {you/SP} have {DISPLAY NUMBER} or more drinks in a single day?
ALQ142.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

8.description: 7 to 11 times in the last year

9.description: 3 to 6 times in the last year

10.description: 1 to 2 times in the last year

ALQ270.label: # times 4-5 drinks in 2hrs/past 12 mos
ALQ270.text: During the past 12 months, about how often did {you/SP} have {DISPLAY NUMBER} or more drinks in a period of two hours or less?
ALQ270.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

ALQ280.label: # times 8+ drinks in 1 day/past 12 mos
ALQ280.text: During the past 12 months, about how often did {you/SP} have 8 or more drinks in a single day?
ALQ280.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

8.description: 7 to 11 times in the last year

9.description: 3 to 6 times in the last year

10.description: 1 to 2 times in the last year

ALQ290.label: # times 12+ drinks in 1 day/past 12 mos
ALQ290.text: During the past 12 months, about how often did {you/SP} have 12 or more drinks in a single day?
ALQ290.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

8.description: 7 to 11 times in the last year

9.description: 3 to 6 times in the last year

10.description: 1 to 2 times in the last year

ALQ151.label: Ever have 4/5 or more drinks every day?
ALQ151.text: Was there ever a time or times in {your/SP's} life when {you/he/she} drank {DISPLAY NUMBER} or more drinks of any kind of alcoholic beverage almost every day?
ALQ151.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

ALQ170.label: Past 30 days # times 4-5 drinks on an oc
ALQ170.text: Considering all types of alcoholic beverages, during the past 30 days, how many times did you have {5/4} or more drinks on an occasion?
ALQ170.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAQ605.label: Vigorous work activity
PAQ605.text: Next I am going to ask you about the time {you spend/SP spends} doing different types of physical activity in a typical week. Think first about the time {you spend/he spends/she spends} doing work. Think of work as the things that {you have/he has/she has} to do such as paid or unpaid work, household chores, and yard work. Does {your/SP's} work involve vigorous-intensity activity that causes large increases in breathing or heart rate like carrying or lifting heavy loads, digging or construction work for at least 10 minutes continuously?
PAQ605.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAQ610.label: Number of days vigorous work
PAQ610.text: In a typical week, on how many days {do you/does SP} do vigorous-intensity activities as part of {your/his/her} work?
PAQ610.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAD615.label: Minutes vigorous-intensity work
PAD615.text: How much time {do you/does SP} spend doing vigorous-intensity activities at work on a typical day?
PAD615.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAQ620.label: Moderate work activity
PAQ620.text: Does {your/SP's} work involve moderate-intensity activity that causes small increases in breathing or heart rate such as brisk walking or carrying light loads for at least 10 minutes continuously?
PAQ620.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAQ625.label: Number of days moderate work
PAQ625.text: In a typical week, on how many days {do you/does SP} do moderate-intensity activities as part of {your/his/her} work?
PAQ625.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAD630.label: Minutes moderate-intensity work
PAD630.text: How much time {do you/does SP} spend doing moderate-intensity activities at work on a typical day?
PAD630.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAQ635.label: PAQ635
PAQ635.text: The next questions exclude the physical activity at work that you have already mentioned. Now I would like to ask you about the usual way {you travel/SP travels} to and from places. For example to school, for shopping, to work. In a typical week {do you/does SP} walk or use a bicycle for at least 10 minutes continuously to get to and from places?
PAQ635.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAQ640.label: Number of days walk or bicycle
PAQ640.text: In a typical week, on how many days {do you/does SP} walk or bicycle for at least 10 minutes continuously to get to and from places?
PAQ640.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAD645.label: Minutes walk/bicycle for transportation
PAD645.text: How much time {do you/does SP} spend walking or bicycling for travel on a typical day?
PAD645.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAQ650.label: Vigorous recreational activities
PAQ650.text: The next questions exclude the work and transport activities that you have already mentioned. Now I would like to ask you about sports, fitness and recreational activities. In a typical week {do you/does SP} do any vigorous-intensity sports, fitness, or recreational activities that cause large increases in breathing or heart rate like running or basketball for at least 10 minutes continuously?
PAQ650.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAQ655.label: Days vigorous recreational activities
PAQ655.text: In a typical week, on how many days {do you/does SP} do vigorous-intensity sports, fitness or recreational activities?
PAQ655.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAD660.label: Minutes vigorous recreational activities
PAD660.text: How much time {do you/does SP} spend doing vigorous-intensity sports, fitness or recreational activities on a typical day?
PAD660.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAQ665.label: Moderate recreational activities
PAQ665.text: In a typical week {do you/does SP} do any moderate-intensity sports, fitness, or recreational activities that cause a small increase in breathing or heart rate such as brisk walking, bicycling, swimming, or volleyball for at least 10 minutes continuously?
PAQ665.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAQ670.label: Days moderate recreational activities
PAQ670.text: In a typical week, on how many days {do you/does SP} do moderate-intensity sports, fitness or recreational activities?
PAQ670.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAD675.label: Minutes moderate recreational activities
PAD675.text: How much time {do you/does SP} spend doing moderate-intensity sports, fitness or recreational activities on a typical day?
PAD675.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

PAD680.label: Minutes sedentary activity
PAD680.text: The following question is about sitting at school, at home, getting to and from places, or with friends including time spent sitting at a desk, traveling in a car or bus, reading, playing cards, watching television, or using a computer. Do not include time spent sleeping. How much time {do you/does SP} usually spend sitting on a typical day?
PAD680.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMQ020.label: Smoked at least 100 cigarettes in life
SMQ020.text: These next questions are about cigarette smoking and other tobacco use. {Have you/Has SP} smoked at least 100 cigarettes in {your/his/her} entire life?
SMQ020.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMD030.label: Age started smoking cigarettes regularly
SMD030.text: How old {were you/was SP} when {you/s/he} first started to smoke cigarettes fairly regularly?
SMD030.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMQ040.label: Do you now smoke cigarettes?
SMQ040.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMQ050Q.label: How long since quit smoking cigarettes
SMQ050Q.text: How long has it been since {you/SP} quit smoking cigarettes?
SMQ050Q.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMQ050U.label: Unit of measure (day/week/month/year)
SMQ050U.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMD057.label: # cigarettes smoked per day when quit
SMD057.text: At that time, about how many cigarettes did {you/SP} usually smoke per day?
SMD057.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMQ078.label: How soon after waking do you smoke
SMQ078.text: How soon after you wake up do you smoke? Would you say...
SMQ078.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

3.description: From more than 30 minutes to one hour

4.description: From more than 1 hour to 2 hours

5.description: From more than 2 hours to 3 hours

6.description: From more than 3 hours to 4 hours

SMD641.label: # days smoked cigs during past 30 days
SMD641.text: On how many of the past 30 days did {you/SP} smoke a cigarette?
SMD641.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMD650.label: Avg # cigarettes/day during past 30 days
SMD650.text: During the past 30 days, on the days that {you/SP} smoked, about how many cigarettes did {you/s/he} smoke per day?
SMD650.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMD100FL.label: Cigarette Filter type
SMD100FL.text: Do you usually smoke filtered or non-filtered cigarettes?
SMD100FL.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMD100MN.label: Cigarette Menthol indicator
SMD100MN.text: Do you usually smoke menthol or non-menthol cigarettes?
SMD100MN.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMQ670.label: Tried to quit smoking
SMQ670.text: During the past 12 months, {have you/has SP} stopped smoking for longer than a day because {you were/he was/she was} trying to quit smoking?
SMQ670.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMQ621.label: Cigarettes smoked in entire life
SMQ621.text: The following questions are about cigarette smoking and other tobacco use. Do not include cigars or marijuana. About how many cigarettes have you smoked in your entire life?
SMQ621.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

1.description: I have never smoked, not even a puff

2.description: 1 or more puffs but never a whole cigarette

SMD630.label: Age first smoked whole cigarette
SMD630.text: How old were you when you smoked a whole cigarette for the first time?
SMD630.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

DBQ700.label: How healthy is the diet
DBQ700.text: Next I have some questions about {your/SP?s} eating habits. In general, how healthy is {your/his/her} overall diet? Would you say...
DBQ700.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS
